title: Gyros Pita
instructions: Season the planted with Greek spices: oregano, thyme, garlic powder, paprika, cumin, and a squeeze of lemon juice. Let marinate for 10 minutes.
Heat olive oil in a pan over high heat. Cook the planted for 5-6 minutes until golden and slightly crispy.
Prepare tzatziki: mix Greek yogurt with grated cucumber, minced garlic, dill, lemon juice, and olive oil.
Warm pita bread in a dry pan or oven until soft and pliable.
Slice tomatoes, red onions, and prepare fresh lettuce. Optional: add sliced kalamata olives and feta cheese.
Assemble gyros: spread tzatziki on pita, add planted, top with vegetables and onions, roll up and serve with extra tzatziki on the side.
